# sds-toggle-tag-list

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Toggle Tag List

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description | Type                               | Default    |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `selectionMode` | `selection-mode` |             | `"multiple" \| "none" \| "single"` | `'single'` |


## Events

| Event            | Description | Type                                     |
| ---------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `togglesUpdated` |             | `CustomEvent<{ [x: string]: boolean; }>` |
